Series.Actors: |Adam Rayner|Ashraf Barhom|Jennifer Finnigan|Moran Atias|Salim Daw|Mehdi Dehbi|Fares Fares|Alice Krige|Anne Winters|Noah Silver|Justin Kirk|
Series.Overview: The series tells the story of an unassuming American family drawn into the workings of a turbulent Middle Eastern nation. Bassam "Barry" Al Fayeed, the younger son of the dictator of a war-torn nation, ends a self-imposed 20-year exile to return to his homeland, accompanied by his American wife and children, for his nephew's wedding. Barryâ€™s reluctant homecoming leads to a dramatic clash of cultures as he is thrown back into the familial and national politics of his youth.
